#summary Documentation for SyxObject
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Structure =

This is the structure of an object: 
{{{
typedef struct _SyxObject SyxObject;

struct _SyxObject {
  SyxObject *class;
  syx_varsize size;
  SyxObject **data;
};
}}}

The *size* field, is the number of elements contained in the *data* field.

= Creating new objects =

This is the most common way to create an object giving a class:
{{{
SyxObject *syx_object_new (SyxObject *class);
}}}
Automatically allocates the object and the necessary memory to hold instance variables.
